project_abstract.cdata: The project would consist of three components: (a) provision of farm machinery for crop improvement and reclamation of over 150,000 ha; (b) construction and operation of liquid fertilizer plants and provision of special transportation and spreading equipment; and (c) institutional development including strengthening research and management information systems, and training of Hungarian technicians in fields related to crop production, farm economics and management.
